info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 9:50PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern McDonough County through 1015 PM CDT... At 950 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Industry, or 10 miles south of Macomb, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Adair around 1005 PM CDT. Bardolph around 1010 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Bushnell and New Philadelphia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
